subject: Hi ,
body:
Hi ,
I am glad I found you.
I have a project that I would like to execute with you.
This is going to favor the two of us. Kindly confirm your willingness to partner with me so that I can furnish you with full details of the project.
I am waiting for your reply. (
ken777609@gmail.com
 )
Warm regards ,
Mr. Ken Nelson

subject: Re:   Hi ,
body:
Hello Mr. Ken Nelson,

It's a pleasure to meet you! I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to hear more about this project you're suggesting. Could you please provide me with some more details? What kind of project is it? How do you envision our partnership working?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jerome
